Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays, Boarding Change at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare, board all Forest Park-bound trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare, board all Forest Park-bound trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Rosemont

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
